original_text: They said, ‘The land at Ataroth, Dibon, Jazer, Nimrah, Heshbon, Elealeh, Sebam, Nebo and Beon 4 is good for animals. The Lord has given all this land to us Israelites. We have very many animals, 5 so please let us have this land for our animals. Let us have this land to live on, instead of land on the other side of the Jordan River.’
korean_text: 아다롯과 디본과 야셀과 니므라와 헤스본과 엘르알레와 스밤과 느보와 브온

sentences.original_text: The land at Ataroth, Dibon, Jazer, Nimrah
sentences.korean_translation: 아다롯, 디본, 야셀, 님므라에 있는 땅은

sentences.original_text: Heshbon, Elealeh, Sebam, Nebo and Beon
The Lord has given all this land to us Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 이 모든 땅을 우리 이스라엘 사람들에게 주셨다

sentences.original_text: so please let us have this land for our animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 우리 동물들을 위해 이 땅을 갖게 해달라

sentences.original_text: Let us have this land to live on
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 살기 위해 이 땅을 갖게 해달라

sentences.original_text: instead of land on the other side of the Jordan River
